title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8000.3 - Stay and amendment of rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8000.3 - Stay and amendment of rules and regulations

State Regulations

The chairman in his discretion, or the board in its
discretion, may direct orally or in writing that any rule or regulation may be
stayed, suspended, rescinded, modified or amended. If the direction is oral, it
shall be reduced to writing as soon as practicable, and if the direction
constitutes an amendment, it shall be filed with the Secretary of

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8000.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
